Major_Arcs.title: The Mystery of Ghost Town and Initial Reactions
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the setting of Ghost Town, the initial mystery of its authenticity, and the contrasting reactions of different characters to its unusual nature and impending destruction.

sub_scenes.title: Discovery and Internal Conflict in the Saloon
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the saloon setting in Ghost Town and the woman in the green hat's initial reactions and internal thoughts about the town's authenticity and her place in it.

narrative_arcs.title: Woman's Internal Thoughts on Time Discrepancy

sub_scenes.title: Urgent Plea to Leave Ghost Town
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a conversation between a man and a blonde woman, highlighting the man's urgent desire for the woman to leave Ghost Town due to perceived danger and past experiences.

sub_scenes.title: Nostalgic Memories and Present Reality
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene explores Nan's past connection to Ghost Town through her memories and contrasts it with the harsh reality of the present, including the clarification of Ghost Town's current state.

narrative_arcs.title: Clarification of Ghost Town's Current State

sub_scenes.title: Shock and Justification of Demolition
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Nan's emotional reaction to the news of the airport construction and the surveyors' cold justification for demolishing Ghost Town, highlighting the conflict between preservation and progress.

narrative_arcs.title: Reaction to Airport Plan - Initial Shock and Disbelief

Major_Arcs.title: Relationship Dynamics and Demolition
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc delves into the complex relationship between Nan and Cal, contrasting Nan's romantic ideals with Cal's practical nature, set against the backdrop of Ghost Town's demolition.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Notions vs. Practical Love
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene explores the differing perspectives on love and romance between Nan and Cal, highlighting Nan's 'romantic notions' and Cal's more pragmatic expressions of affection.

narrative_arcs.title: Cal's Perspective on Dreams and Ghost Town

sub_scenes.title: Chaotic Demolition and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the chaotic and destructive demolition of Ghost Town, showing the physical manifestation of the surveyors' plans and Nan's distressed reaction.

sub_scenes.title: Business and Paternal Conflict
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to a domestic setting, showing business discussions related to the airport construction and escalating into a conflict between Nan and her father regarding her opinions and role.

sub_scenes.title: Humiliation and Mother's Comfort
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Nan's emotional distress and humiliation following her confrontation with her father, and transitions to receiving comfort and relationship advice from her mother and the maid.

narrative_arcs.title: Confirmation of Cal's Affection and Effort

sub_scenes.title: Nan's Determination and Business Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Nan's internal resolve to seek clarity in her relationship with Cal, followed by her immediate shift to business matters and a confrontation regarding a deal.

sub_scenes.title: Confession, Departure, and Longing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Nan's emotional confession to Cal, his cryptic response and departure, and Nan's subsequent longing and pursuit after a period of separation.

narrative_arcs.title: Expression of Deep Feelings and Cryptic Response
Passage of Time and Lingering Longing
Confession of Pursuit and Revealed Motivation

Major_Arcs.title: Blizzard and Operation Hay Lift
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the onset of a severe blizzard, the resulting crisis, and the community's response, culminating in the arrival of Operation Hay Lift as a solution.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Weather Deterioration
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene continues the conversation between Nan and Cal, now focusing on Nan confronting Cal about his changed behavior, interrupted by the arrival of Mr. Wills with a grim weather report.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Confession about Changed Behavior

sub_scenes.title: Livestock Crisis and Domestic Worry
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the growing crisis due to the heavy snowfall, focusing on the concern for livestock fodder and the worry for Cal and Dad who are out in the blizzard.

narrative_arcs.title: Indoor Discussion of Weather and Worry for Loved Ones

sub_scenes.title: Cal's Resolve and Operation Hay Lift
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Cal's determined reaction to the crisis and his decision to act, followed by the hopeful arrival of Operation Hay Lift, bringing relief and renewed hope.

narrative_arcs.title: Cal's Determined Resolve and Acceptance of Responsibility
Recollection of Restlessness and Expression of Hopelessness
Arrival of the Plane and Fodder Drop
Relief, Gratitude, and Renewed Hope with 'Operation Hay Lift'

Major_Arcs.title: Western Town Showdown and Differing Perspectives
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a new setting and introduces a cowboy showdown in a Western town, exploring the varied reactions and interpretations of the cowboy's actions from different townspeople.

sub_scenes.title: Cowboy Confrontation and Initial Reactions
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets the stage with a dramatic cowboy showdown in a Western town and captures the immediate, diverse reactions of the onlookers.

sub_scenes.title: Youthful Admiration vs. Mature Disdain
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents contrasting opinions on the cowboy's actions, from youthful admiration to mature disdain, reflecting different perspectives on heroism and manners.

narrative_arcs.title: Defense and Critique of Cowboy's Manners

Major_Arcs.title: Jeff's Obsession and Sally's Intervention
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Sally's concern for her brother Jeff's growing obsession with guns and a cowboy figure, Clyde Surrett, and her attempts to intervene and redirect his path.

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Worry and Jeff's Gun Fascination
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Sally's deep concern about Jeff's hero worship and his unhealthy fascination with guns, setting up her attempts to correct his behavior.

narrative_arcs.title: Sally's Concern for Jeff's Hero Worship
Sally's Disappointment and Jeff's Clyde Surrett Defense
Jeff's Justification of Clyde Surrett and Dismissal of Chane Benson
Sally's Rejection of Jeff's Claims and Warning
Jeff's Threat and Sally's Fearful Response

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Help and Past Advice
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Sally's increasing frustration and worry leading her to seek help from Clyde Surrett and Pete, and Pete recalling past advice given to a younger Jeff about guns.

narrative_arcs.title: Sally's Plea to Clyde and His Reassurance
Pete's Commitment to Helping Jeff and Sally's Appreciation
Pete's Flashback and Gun Advice to Young Jeff

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Mr. Benson and Article Conflict
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Mr. Benson and sets up the conflict arising from an article, possibly written by Clyde, that angers Benson and leads to confrontations.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Mr. Benson and His Humble Response
Sally's Warning to Mr. Benson about Clyde's Anger
Mr. Benson's Dismissal of Danger and Confrontation with Sally
Mr. Benson's Justification for Staying in Town

sub_scenes.title: Escalating Article Conflict and Defiance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the escalating conflict surrounding Clyde's article, showing various reactions and Clyde's defiant stance on journalistic integrity, leading to Sally and Jeff's discussion.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Defense Regarding Clyde's Article
Background on Clyde's Defiant Actions and Consequences
Sally and Jeff's Discussion about Clyde and Benson's Conflict
Dinner Invitation and Evaluation of Chane's Skills

sub_scenes.title: Dinner Deception and Sibling Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals the ulterior motives behind the dinner invitation and escalates into a heated and physical confrontation between Jeff and Sally, revealing deep-seated tensions and misunderstandings.

sub_scenes.title: Benson's Intervention and Town Showdown
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Chane's arrival and judgment of Jeff, followed by Benson's violent intervention and the escalation of the conflict into a town showdown.

narrative_arcs.title: Sally's Urgency and Chane's Pursuit of Clyde

Major_Arcs.title: Resolution in Town and Newspaper Aftermath
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the resolution of the town confrontation, Benson's departure, and the subsequent activities in the Clarion newspaper office, reflecting on the events and their implications.

sub_scenes.title: Tense Standoff and Office Wait
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the tense standoff between Benson and Jeff, followed by Jeff and his colleague waiting anxiously in the Clarion office.

narrative_arcs.title: Anticipation and Fear at the Door

sub_scenes.title: Relief and Newspaper Edition
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene brings relief with the news of Benson leaving town and shifts focus to the Clarion office, where the next edition is being prepared, reflecting on journalistic integrity and courage.

Major_Arcs.title: Ranch Troubles and Arrival of Steve Daley
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc transitions to a ranch setting, introducing ranch management issues and the arrival of a new foreman, Steve Daley, amidst existing conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Brawl and New Hire Introduction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene starts with a physical altercation on the ranch and introduces Steve Daley as the new hired man, creating initial ambiguity about his role.

narrative_arcs.title: Ranch Brawl and Rejection of Gunplay
Introducing Steve Daley and the New Boss
Confirmation of Betsy's Competence and Steve's Approval

sub_scenes.title: Personality Clash and Ranch Trouble Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene showcases the initial dynamic between Steve and Betsy, highlighting Steve's unflappable nature and Betsy's assertive personality, followed by the revelation of serious ranch troubles and accusations.

narrative_arcs.title: Steve's Casual Acceptance and Betsy's Amusement
Hank's Skepticism and Betsy's Defense of Steve
Betsy's Accusation and Hank's Explanation of Ranch Troubles
Mutual Caution and Agreement to Investigate

Major_Arcs.title: Investigation and Romantic Development on the Ranch
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Betsy and Steve's investigation into ranch troubles and the simultaneous development of their romantic relationship amidst the unfolding mystery.

sub_scenes.title: Departure for Town and Paternal Orders
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Betsy and Steve preparing to go to town to investigate, highlighting the tension and Betsy's compliance with her father's unusual orders.

narrative_arcs.title: Departure to Town and Buckboard Ride
Questioning Hank's Orders and Material for Dress

sub_scenes.title: Town Arrival and Bridges Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Betsy and Steve's arrival in town and their immediate confrontation with Fred Bridges and his men, leading to a physical fight.

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Romantic Proposition
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the aftermath of the fight, Betsy reiterating her ranch policy, and Steve revealing his true desires and romantic feelings for Betsy.

Major_Arcs.title: Devil's Pass Conflict and Romantic Climax
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc intensifies the ranch conflict, leading to a confrontation at Devil's Pass, a flashback revealing past betrayal, and ultimately a romantic resolution for Betsy and Steve amidst danger.

sub_scenes.title: Bridges' Complaint and Valley Route Warning
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up the conflict at Devil's Pass with Old Man Bridges' complaint and Betsy's warning to Steve about the dangerous valley route.

narrative_arcs.title: Valley Route Warning and Impending Confrontation

sub_scenes.title: Devil's Pass Confrontation and Injury
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the intense confrontation at Devil's Pass, Steve's determined action, Betsy's intervention, and her subsequent injury.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Devil's Pass and Confrontation

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Reunion and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene resolves the immediate conflict with a romantic reunion between Betsy and Steve, reaffirming their love and commitment after the danger at Devil's Pass.

Major_Arcs.title: New Romantic Entanglements and Ranch Disputes
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new set of characters and romantic entanglements, focusing on Carrie, Dave, and Fred, along with ranch-related disputes and conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Worry for Dave and Curley's Presence
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Carrie's concern for Dave's emotional state and her confusion about Curley's unexpected presence, hinting at underlying tensions and romantic complexities.

narrative_arcs.title: Concern for Dave and Father's Disapproval
Reflection on Morning Routine and Curley's Presence
Concern about Curley and Bear Fenin's Trouble

sub_scenes.title: Fence Dispute and Escalating Tension
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a ranch dispute over a newly erected fence, escalating from verbal complaints to threats of violence, involving the older rancher, Fred Gordon, and Curley.

narrative_arcs.title: Dispute Over Fencing and Grazing Land
Escalating Tension Over Fence and Water Access
Defensive Stance and Threat of Gunplay
Curley's Gun Draw and Impending Violence

sub_scenes.title: Curley's Apology and Romantic Complications
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts focus to Curley's apology to Carrie and the exploration of the complicated romantic relationships between Carrie, Dave, and Fred, revealing Carrie's conflicted feelings.

narrative_arcs.title: Carrie and Dave Discussing Feelings and Fred

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Climax and Business Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around Carrie's romantic journey, culminating in a proposal from Fred but quickly turning sour as she uncovers his manipulative nature and business-driven motives.

sub_scenes.title: Fred's Declaration and Romantic Hopes
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Fred's confident declaration of love and proposal to Carrie, initially leading to romantic reconciliation and hope for their future.

sub_scenes.title: Business Motives and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals Fred's manipulative business motives behind his proposal, leading to Carrie's realization of his betrayal and her subsequent rejection.

Major_Arcs.title: Confrontation and Emotional Resolution for Carrie
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Carrie's decisive confrontation with Fred, her emotional release, and the resolution of her immediate romantic and business conflicts, leading to a sense of victory and self-reliance.

sub_scenes.title: Carlton's Office Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie's planned confrontation with Fred and Carlton at Carlton's office, exposing Fred's deceit and asserting her independence.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Confrontation at Carlton's Office
Reflecting on Fred's Defeat and Carrie's Victory

sub_scenes.title: Chance Encounter and Confession to Dave
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Carrie's chance encounter with Dave at a store, leading to her confession of love for Fred and Dave's subsequent suspicion during a buckboard ride.

narrative_arcs.title: Chance Encounter and Casual Conversation at the Store
Inquiries About Fred and Confession of Love

Major_Arcs.title: Chris and Dirk's Escape and Rance's Pursuit
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Chris and Dirk's escape narrative, focusing on Dirk's injury, their flight from the law, and Chris's developing relationship with Marshal Rance Cready.

sub_scenes.title: Urgent Arrival and Shocking Injury Reveal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene starts with Dirk's urgent arrival at Chris's home, revealing his serious gunshot wound and prompting Chris to seek help from her father.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Concern and Arrival of Visitors

sub_scenes.title: Investigation and Marshal's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the father's investigation into the shooting and transitions to the arrival of Marshal Rance Cready, initiating a confrontation with Chris.

narrative_arcs.title: Escalating Confrontation and Claim of Authority

sub_scenes.title: Legal Justification and Conditional Offer
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Rance Cready inside the house, explaining the legal reasons for taking Dirk into custody but offering a conditional stay, softening his initial confrontational approach.

narrative_arcs.title: Passage of Time and Acceptance of Reality

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Confession and Escape Planning
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the unexpected romantic development between Chris and Rance, with Chris confessing her love, but simultaneously shifts to Chris planning Dirk's escape, creating a conflict between love and duty.

narrative_arcs.title: Re-emergence of Duty and Dirk's Fate

Major_Arcs.title: The Chase, Shootout, and Moral Dilemma
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the dramatic chase and violent confrontation between Dirk, Chris, and Marshal Rance Cready, culminating in a shootout and a difficult moral dilemma.

sub_scenes.title: The Chase and Violent Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the intense chase on horseback, the futile attempts to evade the Marshal, and the violent shootout when confrontation becomes inevitable.

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Moral Choice
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the immediate aftermath of the shootout, Rance's injury, and the ensuing moral dilemma about whether to provide aid or resort to mercy killing for self-preservation.

narrative_arcs.title: Moral Dilemma: Mercy Killing vs. Survival

Major_Arcs.title: Resolution and Romantic Climax for Chris and Rance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the narrative for Chris and Rance, showing their emotional resolution, Rance's recovery, Dirk's escape to Mexico, and the culmination of Chris and Rance's romance in marriage.

sub_scenes.title: First Aid, Reflection, and Dirk's Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Chris providing first aid to Rance, Rance's internal reflections, and Dirk's decision to depart for Mexico, setting the stage for individual resolutions.

narrative_arcs.title: Providing First Aid and Assessing Injury
Parting Ways and Concern for Criminal Escape
Plea to Return and Confession of Love
Rance's Self-Recrimination and Awareness of Burden
Concern for Riding and Inquiry about Dirk
Successful Escape to Mexico and Relief

sub_scenes.title: Recovery, Proposal, and Wedding Backstory
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Rance's recovery, the romantic culmination of Chris and Rance's relationship with a marriage proposal and acceptance, and a flashback providing backstory during their wedding.

narrative_arcs.title: Rance's Reassurance and Readiness for Action
